physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two men posing and standing up. They adorn military uniforms. The military personnel on the right has a lighted cigarette in his left hand. Both of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The background of the photograph shows that it was taken outside a building.
title_text: Two Military Personnel Posing Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
